Class NanoHttpdServer.Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • dollar.http.NanoHttpdServer.Response
  • Enclosing class:
    NanoHttpdServer

    public static class NanoHttpdServer.Response
extends java.lang.Object
    HTTP response. Return one of these from serve().
